comment: Hi there,  Thanks for making a wonderful app like Knockr, bring convenience to many android phone users.  I would like to highlight a problem when using Knockr. Using this app will disable the LED notification light on my Samsung Note 3 as the notification light requires the screen to be off.  It will be great if you can solve this problem in the next update!  Thank you.
title: Disabled LED notification light on Samsung Note 3

comment: It keeps the screen on and drains the battery on my HTC One M7. Please fix this issue that many users are having. I love the concept of this app.
title: Screen staying on

comment: Yes is a great app but could you update to turn off the button light as well when the screen is turn off thanks you :)
title: Home and back button Light remain when screen is off on HTC One

comment: Great app. But when using Toucher Pro,  you can still see the touch button on the black lockscreen.
title: Note 3

comment: Fixed on screen button issue but huge battery hog. Developer is quick, looking forward to improvements. Moto x
title: Improvement

comment: I gladly retract my previous bad review :). The app developers fixed the app very promptly! Works as described!
title: Fixed problems

comment: It works, but sometimes you can't turn on the phone with the power button, but other than that it's good stuff.
title: Works

comment: Double tap works as expected. Perhaps you can turn off the capacitive button lights as well? Something like:   Field field = getWindow().getAttributes().getClass().getField("buttonBrightness"); field.set(getWindow().getAttributes(), 0);
title: Works great!

comment: It keeps my capacitive buttons on when I trigger the proximity sensor and it is a tad glitchy with the taps and power button but overall fast and very useful.
title: Just what I needed!

comment: When charging the phone while screen is turned off , the red notification led does not turn on
title: Note 3 SM-9005 bug

comment: This is truly a great app and it works flawlessly on Note 3 but I also use NILS Lockscreen and it doesn't shut the screen off when a alert/push msg comes through.  Battery drain but I love the idea so I still give 4 stars. Awesome work.
title: Great App

comment: doesnt work sometime until home button pressed when screen off
title: good but

comment: For the most part, this app does not work on my Galaxy Note 3, but the potential is there. I am going to keep it and follow updates, and if it improves, I will gladly donate to the developer!
title: Poor so far, but if it improves...

comment: Please make this available for other types of screens. Then it gets 5 stars
title: Love the idea

comment: I noticed the first 2 taps that should wake up the screen don't instead it turns on the capacitive button light and 2 more taps unlock it please fix this for S3 then I will rate it 5 stars
title: Has potential

comment: Double tap brings up on screen buttons only, double tap again turns screen on. I'm running cm11 on gs3.  Update: Thanks for the fix! Works perfect!
title: Love the idea but

comment: I m on galaxy note 2 GT N7100. Its taking tym 2 load . After 2nd attempt its working fine and its an awesum app ..saves a lotta tym . THANK YOU DEVELOPER FOR MAKING THIS APP 100STARS R LESS FOR THIS APP .. ONE REQ ITS LAGGING A BIT PLZ FIX IT OTHER WISE ITS ONE HELL OF AN APP.  REGARDS FAIZAN
title: Awesum app..

comment: Make the LED notifications work on the note 3 and get 5 stars.  Almost there!

title: 反应慢

comment: I love thise app great one but there is a little bug can u fix that please thanks
